channel.title: Update server (yes i know not another one)
channel.description: ok what i want to do is disable the update server completly and make it load from the cache file (class72.java has the signlink in it) so i edited that and made it load out of the .\cache\ and that works so now i have to disable the update server to make it work from a computer without the error_game_j5connect error and this is deob 459.

item.title: Update server (yes i know not another one)
item.dc:creator: @rukki rukki
item.description:
@rukki wrote:

You need it to connect to a normal server. No matter what (317, 377, 455+).
Because it sends a package, and the package must go to a server.
If it doesnâ€™t, you get the error_game_j5connect, that means no update server.

Read full topic
item.source: Update server (yes i know not another one)

item.title: Update server (yes i know not another one)
item.dc:creator: @rukki rukki
item.description:
@rukki wrote:

Try this in Client.java change

(Socket) (Class16.aClass6_311.anObject149)

to

(new Socket("swe3.runescape.com", 43594)

It works for me, but you need to change the client number (459 or somthing) every time Jagex update the runescape version.
It connects to the runescape update server.

Read full topic
